Package in.co.rays.proj4.util

Class HTMLUtility

  • java.lang.Object
    • in.co.rays.proj4.util.HTMLUtility
  • public class HTMLUtility
extends java.lang.Object

    Utility class responsible for generating dynamic HTML select (dropdown) components for JSP pages.

    Supports:

    • Dropdown creation using a HashMap (key-value pairs)
    • Dropdown creation using a List of objects implementing DropdownListBean
    • Automatically selecting a default value

    Used heavily in forms like:

    • User Registration
    • Role Selection
    • Gender Dropdown
    • Course / College / Subject dropdowns

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:

    • Method Detail

      • getList

        public static java.lang.String getList​(java.lang.String name,
                                       java.lang.String selectedVal,
                                       java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> map)
        Generates an HTML dropdown (<select>) using a HashMap.
        Parameters:
        name - name of the HTML select element
        selectedVal - value that should be pre-selected
        map - map containing dropdown values (key = option value, value = label)
        Returns:
        HTML string representing a fully constructed <select> element

      • getList

        public static java.lang.String getList​(java.lang.String name,
                                       java.lang.String selectedVal,
                                       java.util.List list)
        Generates an HTML dropdown (<select>) using a list of objects that implement DropdownListBean.

        The key-value pair is extracted from:

        • DropdownListBean.getKey()
        • DropdownListBean.getValue()
        Parameters:
        name - name of the HTML select element
        selectedVal - value that should be pre-selected
        list - list of objects implementing DropdownListBean
        Returns:
        HTML string representing the dropdown

      • testGetListByMap

        public static void testGetListByMap()
        Test method: Generates a dropdown using a HashMap.

        Test method: Generates a dropdown from the list returned by RoleModel.
